name: Ijarah: Delivery Before Rent (Critical Hard Gate)
description: CRITICAL GATE: Asset must be physically delivered and handed over to lessee before any rental payments can be collected. This is a fundamental Shariah requirement for Ijarah validity.

steps.title: Schedule Asset Handover
steps.description: Coordinate with lessee to schedule formal asset handover ceremony or delivery

requiredEvidence.description: Agreed date, time, and location for asset handover
Asset condition report confirming it is fit for purpose

policyConstraints.constraint: Asset must be in deliverable condition - any defects must be disclosed

steps.title: Physical Asset Delivery and Handover
steps.description: Execute formal handover of asset to lessee with signed delivery receipt. Lessee must acknowledge receipt and condition of asset

requiredEvidence.description: Physical or electronic delivery receipt signed by lessee acknowledging receipt of asset
Formal certificate documenting asset details, condition, and handover date/time
Written statement from lessee confirming asset is in acceptable condition and fits intended use
Photos of asset at time of handover (especially for high-value assets)

policyConstraints.constraint: CRITICAL SHARIAH REQUIREMENT: Asset must be physically delivered before rent collection begins
Regulatory requirement: Delivery must be documented with signed evidence

steps.title: Shariah Compliance Verification (Ex-Post)
steps.description: Shariah Compliance Officer verifies that delivery occurred before rental payments and all evidence is complete

requiredEvidence.description: SCO confirmation that delivery-before-rent requirement was met
Analysis showing delivery date precedes first rental payment date
Confirmation that no Shariah non-compliance risk (SNCR) was triggered

policyConstraints.constraint: Shariah Compliance Function must verify ex-post that transaction complied with Shariah requirements

criticalNote: ⚠️ HARD GATE: If asset is not delivered before rental payments begin, the Ijarah contract is INVALID per AAOIFI SS-9 §4/4. Any rent collected before delivery is non-Shariah-compliant income requiring purification (charity donation).
